resources.string: [p]In this area you can play around with Admidio and see whether the program's functions meet your needs.[/p][p]We have also provided some test data so that you can see in the individual modules how this could look later on your site. However, emails are not actually sent in the demo area so that this function cannot be abused. You are welcome to play with this installation.[/p][p]We have created a few test accounts with different rights:[/p][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Administrator[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Admin[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rights:[/td][td]Can see and edit everything. More rights are not possible :)[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Chairman[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Chairman[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rights:[/td][td]Can edit and view everything, except assigning roles and changing program/module settings.[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Member[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Member[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rechte:[/td][td]Can edit his profile and view lists of roles, where he is a member.[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p]Have fun trying ![br /]The Admidio Team[/p]
Starting next season, there are new jerseys for all active players. These can be picked up before the first training at the trainer.
During the holidays we offer a [i]aerobic course[/i] to all interested members.\n\nRegistrations are accepted on our [b]homepage[/b] or in our [b]office[/b].
Today we have our barbecue. In addition to crisp sausages, chops and bacon, there are also various salads.
A four-day training course for youth coaches from the tennis department :)
The focus of this course lies with the Office products.
On this hopefully sunny day it goes to Amsterdam.\n\nA canal cruise and a shopping trip are planned.
This course teaches the basics of yoga.\n\nA registration for this course is required.
Today we will put the focus on physical fitness and stamina.\n\nPlease appear all in time with running shoes on the sports field!

Welcome to the guestbook of the demo area.

Here you can play around and test the capabilities of Admidio.

We hope you enjoy it and that we can convince you of this great program.
Then I'm going to look at the program.

For more information about the program look in the [a href="https://www.admidio.org/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=de:2.0:index"]documentation[/a].\n\nFor questions and suggestions just visit our [a href="https://forum.admidio.org"]forum[/a].
On this site there's not much news :(
The homepage of the [b]best[/b] open source membership management in the net.

The forum for the online membership management software. Here get's everyone support, who has encountered a problem while installing or setting up Admidio. But also suggestions and tips can be posted here.
The documentation for Admidio with valuable help and tips.
[p]Hi all,[/p][br /][p]please maintain your schedules on the website so that all members have the opportunity to view and participate.[/p][br /][p]Regards[/p][br /][p]Paul[/p][br /]

[p]Hello Board,[/p][br /][p]I have now unlocked the [strong]Documents and Files[/strong] module. Please log in and have a look at this module[/p][br /][p]The module has among others. following functions:[/p][br /][ul][br /] [li]Files and documents can be uploaded by the board[/li][br /] [li]Files and documents can be downloaded by all members[/li][br /] [li]Files and documents can be displayed directly on the web[/li][br /][br /ul][br /][p]You can send feedback directly to me. [/p][br /][p]Best regards[/p][br /][p]Paul[/p][br /]
[p]Hello everyone,[/p][br /][p]I have put the new training times on the website.[/p][br /][p]Many greetings[/p][br /][p]Paul[/p][br /]
[p]Dear Ladies and Gentlemen,[/p][br /][p]the board of directors hereby invites you to the annual members meeting in our clubhouse.[/p][br /][p]Yours sincerely[/p][br /][p]Paul Schmidt[/p][br /]
Hi Paul,[br /]can you reserve the room for the general meeting?[br /]Greetings[br /]Eric
Hi Jennifer,[br /]you haven't transferred your membership fee yet. [br /]Can you please do it yet.[br /]Regards[br /]Eric
[p]Hi Dana and Daria,[/p][br /][p]are you coming for training next week?[/p][br /][p]Please write me a short answer[/p][br /][p]Many greetings[/p][br /][p]Jennifer[/p][br /]
Hi Paul,[br /]unfortunately I don't have access to the documents.[br /]Can you check it out.[br /]Regards[br /]Jennifer
Hi Jennifer,[br /]I have redeposited the rights. Please check this again.[br /]Greetings[br /]Paul
An unforgettable vacation in Croatia with most beautiful sunshine and much nature.
A trip to the legendary Inca city of Machu Picchu in the mountains of Peru.
Any member may enter his favorite color
In this room meetings can take place. The room must be reserved in advance. A projector is available.
The function room can be used for birthday parties, annual meetings or party's. Advance booking is desirable.
